attributes.action: Pressure the chinese and vietnamese governments to ban the ill treatment of bears.
attributes.additional_details: Around 12000 bears are kept in captivity in small cages force to lie on theyre backs, and they are cruely harvested for bile, this ill treatment for the bears should be banned no animal should be treated in such an inhumane way, there is a synthetic version of bile wich the chinese could use, so the harvesting of bears is nolonger needed. please sign this e-petition
